channel.title: Population Dynamics on
channel.description: Recent content in Population Dynamics on

item.title: Expertise on wolf population dynamic in France
item.description:
Our report (in French) on foresighting wolf population dynamic in France is available from here. My contribution was mostly based on the work of my present or former students, including L. Marescot, J. Louvrier and S. Cubaynes.

Difficult exercise, partly because you constantly think of what people will retain from your writings.
